briefdescription.para: internal state id used for load/restore
allows construction of hierarchical state machine

simplesect.para: state that owns this sub-state (or null if plain state)

briefdescription.para: adds transition into m_fsm transition table
idle state does not expect any animation events

simplesect.para: true if this state is idle
true if weapon bolt is open

briefdescription.para: called when sub-machine has changed its state
called on current state when state machine has changed its state

memberdef.argsstring: (Weapon_Base w=NULL, WeaponStateBase parent=NULL, WeaponActions action=WeaponActions.NONE, int actionType=-1)
memberdef.name: WeaponUnjamming

detaileddescription.para: Class comes with entry/update/abort/exit hooks that can be overriden in custom states
Class is ready for hierarchic composition, i.e. this state having a sub-machine running under hood. If no m_fsm member is configured, class acts as ordinary plain finite machine state.
